mapper.insert: insert into photo_board(pb_num, pb_title, pb_content, pb_photo_name, pb_photo_path, credat,cretim) values(seq_pb_num.nextval,#{pbTitle},#{pbContent},#{pbPhotoName},#{pbPhotoPath}, TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD'),TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') )
mapper.select:
select * from (select rownum rcnt, pb.* from (select * from photo_board
and pb_title like '%' || #{pbTitle} || '%'
and pb_content like '%' || #{pbContent} || '%'
and credat >= replace(#{credat1},'-','')
and credat <= replace(#{credat2},'-','')
order by pb_num desc) pb where rownum<=#{page.endNum}) where rcnt>=#{page.startNum}

select count(1) from photo_board
and pb_title like '%' || #{pbTitle} || '%'
and pb_content like '%' || #{pbContent} || '%'
and credat >= replace(#{credat1},'-','')
and credat <= replace(#{credat2},'-','')
